faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: How long does it take to process my application?
faq.a1: Processing typically takes 3-5 business days. Express processing is available for an additional fee and takes 1-2 business days.
faq.q2: What countries accept the International Driving Permit?
faq.a2: The IDP is recognized in over 150 countries worldwide. It's valid in all countries that are signatories to the 1968 Vienna Convention on Road Traffic.
faq.q3: How long is the permit valid?
faq.a3: The International Driving Permit is valid for one year from the date of issue. You cannot renew it; you must apply for a new one.
faq.q4: Can I drive without my domestic license?
faq.a4: No, the IDP is not valid by itself. You must carry both your domestic driver's license and the IDP when driving internationally.
